thread.title: Rickardo NY
thread.title_full: Thread Logic reviewed by Rickardo NY

author: Rickardo NY
title: Rickardo NY
text: ordering the shirts was pretty painless, multiple orders placed on the same day were placed in the same order to avoid additional shipping, that was great, logo was on file so no pdf, also great. Only issue is turn around to receiving shirts was a slow, it takes over three weeks, if you get it down to two weeks you would be perfect thanks
